aboutUs.message:
This project is my hands-on attempt at recreating a real-world food delivery experience using React. 
I built a Swiggy-inspired UI and core functionalities to showcase my frontend skills with a focus on clean architecture, performance, and responsive design. 
Since public APIs can be unstable, I created dummy/mock APIs based on real Swiggy response data to simulate production scenarios and ensure the app works reliably even after deployment. 
The goal isnâ€™t to clone but to learn, experiment, and demonstrate how I build scalable, production-ready React applications. ðŸš€ðŸ’»âœ¨
